</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns the shown right text in the item with the given index of the listbox or combobox with id idc of the topmost user [[dialog]]. </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''lbTextRight''' [idc, index] </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> idc: [[Number]] of control </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> index: [[Number]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER3</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[String]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>s2</name>=<value> control '''lbTextRight''' index </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p21</name>=<value> control: [[Control]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER21</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>r2</name>=<value> [[String]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE2</name>=<value>____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>_text = _control [[lbTextRight]] 0;</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE2</name>=<value>
